name: myelinbase-backend
description: Myelin Base RAG Application - Serverless Backend (2025 Edition)

scripts.local:start:nocache: cd local-dev && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up -d
scripts.local:reset: cd local-dev && docker-compose down -v && docker-compose up -d
scripts.local:reset:nocache: cd local-dev && docker-compose down -v && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up -d
scripts.api:start: cd infrastructure && sam local start-api --parameter-overrides Stage=local UseBedrock=false DynamoDBEndpoint=http://host.docker.internal:8000 S3Endpoint=http://host.docker.internal:4566 FrontendUrl=http://localhost:3001 --docker-network rag-network --env-vars ../local-dev/env.local.json --warm-containers EAGER
scripts.build:watch: cd infrastructure && nodemon --watch src --ext ts,json --exec "sam build"
scripts.deploy:dev: cd infrastructure && sam build && sam deploy --config-env dev --no-confirm-changeset
scripts.deploy:staging: cd infrastructure && sam build && sam deploy --config-env staging --no-confirm-changeset
scripts.deploy:prod: cd infrastructure && sam build && sam deploy --config-env prod --no-confirm-changeset
scripts.doc:generate: cd infrastructure && npx ts-node --project tsconfig.scripts.json scripts/generate-openapi.ts
scripts.test:documents: cd infrastructure && sam local invoke DocumentsFunction --event events/get-documents.json --env-vars ../local-dev/env.local.json --docker-network rag-network
scripts.test:trigger: cd infrastructure && sam local invoke IngestionTriggerFunction --event events/s3-put.json --env-vars ../local-dev/env.local.json --docker-network rag-network
scripts.test:chat: cd infrastructure && sam local invoke ChatAgentFunction --event events/chat.json --env-vars ../local-dev/env.local.json --docker-network rag-network
